eLTER getSOSProcedureList function

Source: R/getSOSProcedureList.R
getSOSProcedureList.Rd

This function list the procedures of a Sensor Observations Service (SOS).

getSOSProcedureList(sosHost)

Arguments

sosHost

a `character`. It is a SOS endpoint (e.g. http://getit.lteritalia.it). In particular is the path before '/observations/service?'

Value

The output of the function is a `list` with the name and URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) of each procedure.

Author

Alessandro Oggioni, phD (2020) oggioni.a@irea.cnr.it

Examples

getSOSProcedureList(sosHost = 'http://getit.lteritalia.it')

#> $`ENEA Santa Teresa meteorological station`
#> [1] "http://www.get-it.it/sensors/getit.lteritalia.it/procedure/CampbellScientificInc/noModelDeclared/noSerialNumberDeclared/20170914050327762_790362"
#> 
#> $`Secchi disk freshwater version`
#> [1] "http://www.get-it.it/sensors/getit.lteritalia.it/procedure/noManufacturer/noModel/noSerialNumberDeclared/201504110000_23190198"
#> 
#> $`Moldaenke FluoroProbe sensor`
#> [1] "http://www.get-it.it/sensors/getit.lteritalia.it/procedure/noOwnerDeclared/noModelDeclared/noSerialNumberDeclared/1286194C-A5DF-11DF-8ED7-1602DFD72095"
#>
